item.title: Hugo部署到Github问题记录
item.description: 在将Hugo部署到GitHub中时，遇到了一系列问题，大多问题都很快解决了。以下这些问题，有些是在英文搜索中发现解决的，有些是自己摸索着解决的，记录下来，备忘。

item.description: An man who want to learn how to program in Python. Interesting in: Python Linux Hugo Github Lego

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Thank you very much for seeing This site . The site is operated on this site based on the following policy. About access analysis tool This site uses Google’s access analysis tool “Google Analytics”. Google Analytics uses cookies in the same way as above for gathering traffic data. This traffic data is collected anonymously, it does not identify individuals. If you want to disable data collection by Google Analytics, you can refuse collection by disabling cookies and disable it according to the method described on the following page.
